summary.description: PythonVideoAnnotator is a graphical application written in Python, to analyze and create notes for events in videos. It was developed with the aim of helping neuroscience and ethology researchers to identify animalsâ€™ behaviors based on the information extracted from the video.
summary.name: Python Video Annotator
